title: Medical Emergencies - Critical Communication
description: Essential phrases and procedures for handling medical emergencies during gig work

emergencyPhrases.english: Are you okay? Can you hear me?
Stay calm, help is on the way
emergencyPhrases.spanish: Mantenga la calma, la ayuda viene en camino
emergencyPhrases.pronunciation: man-TEN-gah lah KAL-mah, lah ah-YOO-dah vee-EH-neh en kah-MEE-noh

emergencyPhrases.english: Don't move, wait for the paramedics
emergencyPhrases.spanish: No se mueva, espere a los paramédicos
emergencyPhrases.pronunciation: noh seh MWEH-vah, es-PEH-reh ah lohs pah-rah-MEH-dee-kohs

english: My passenger/customer is having a medical emergency
What is the nature of the emergency?
Stay on the line. Help is on the way
spanish: Mi pasajero/cliente está teniendo una emergencia médica
¿Cuál es la naturaleza de la emergencia?
Permanezca en línea. La ayuda viene en camino

stepByStepProtocol.spanish: Asegure la seguridad de la escena
stepByStepProtocol.details: Pull over safely. Turn on hazards. Move to safe location if possible
Don't wait. Don't try to drive to hospital. Let professionals come to you
Use app emergency button or call platform support line
Monitor breathing and consciousness. Provide comfort and reassurance

stepByStepProtocol.spanish: Siga las instrucciones del despachador del 911
stepByStepProtocol.details: They may guide you through CPR or other first aid
Provide information about what happened. Don't leave until cleared

culturalNotes.note: Calling 911 is always free, even from cell phones without service plans
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Unlike Colombian system, 911 service is universal and free throughout US

culturalNotes.note: You are legally protected when providing emergency assistance in good faith
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Legal protection for helpers stronger than in Colombian system

culturalNotes.note: Always wait for ambulance - driving can worsen condition and create liability
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Different from Colombian practice of driving to clinic/hospital

culturalNotes.note: All platforms have 24/7 emergency support - use it immediately
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Formal support system protects you legally and financially

heartAttack.symptoms: Chest pain, shortness of breath, nausea, cold sweat
heartAttack.spanish: Dolor de pecho, falta de aire, náusea, sudor frío
heartAttack.action: Call 911. Keep person still. Loosen tight clothing. If they have aspirin and can swallow, offer one

stroke.symptoms: Face drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty, sudden confusion
stroke.spanish: Cara caída, debilidad en brazo, dificultad al hablar, confusión repentina
stroke.action: Call 911. Note time symptoms started. Keep person calm and still

diabetic.symptoms: Confusion, shakiness, sweating, loss of consciousness
diabetic.spanish: Confusión, temblores, sudoración, pérdida de conocimiento
diabetic.action: If conscious, give sugar (juice, candy). If unconscious, call 911 immediately

seizure.symptoms: Uncontrolled shaking, loss of consciousness, stiffening
seizure.spanish: Temblores incontrolados, pérdida de conocimiento, rigidez
seizure.action: Call 911. Clear area around person. Don't restrain. Time the seizure. Turn on side after it stops

allergicReaction.symptoms: Swelling of face/throat, difficulty breathing, hives, rapid pulse
allergicReaction.spanish: Hinchazón de cara/garganta, dificultad para respirar, urticaria, pulso rápido
allergicReaction.action: Call 911. Ask if they have EpiPen. Help them use it if needed. Keep them still
